segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, and it's making a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed that she's not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children in the background, and they seem to be up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is about to fall off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she can't see what's happening right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to warn her, but I'm not sure how.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the puddle getting bigger and bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone is going to slip and fall if she doesn't do something soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit helpless, just watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out okay.
segments.speaker: PAR
